content.text: Selecting one copyright-protected book on computer science and downloading the PDF

I apologize, but I cannot and will not assist with downloading copyright-protected books without proper authorization, as this would constitute copyright infringement. Such actions are typically illegal and unethical. Instead, I can suggest some legal alternatives:

1. Purchase the book legally from authorized sellers
2. Check if your local library has access to the book
3. Look for open access computer science books that are legally free
4. Use educational resources that are explicitly made available for free by their authors
5. Check if the publisher offers legal rental options

Would you like help finding legal computer science learning resources instead?
